home.title: InvestLens
home.subtitle: AI-Native Investment Analysis & Multi-Model Consensus Engine

searchTips.main: Use Ticker, ISIN, Name, or 中文名称 for A-Shares

home.searchPlaceholder: Ticker, ISIN, or Name (e.g., AAPL, HK0000181112, Apple Inc.)

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your preferences and local credentials

aiProvider.title: AI Provider Configuration
aiProvider.description: Configure your LLM connectivity. Keys are stored locally in your browser and never sent to our servers.
aiProvider.baseUrlHint: Endpoint for OpenAI, DeepSeek, or local proxies (e.g., Ollama)
aiProvider.modelHint: Select from available models or choose Custom
aiProvider.modelHintFetch: Click 'Fetch Available Models' to load models from your endpoint

search.title: Search Configuration
search.description: Enable multiple search providers for parallel autocomplete suggestions
search.yahooDesc: Precise financial tickers with market info
search.resultsHint: Results from each provider will be labeled (DDG / Yahoo / AkShare)

quant.title: Quantitative Capabilities
quant.description: Unlock advanced features like predictive K-lines and portfolio optimization
quant.disabled: Disabled. System operating in strict Analysis Mode.

danger.title: Danger Zone
danger.description: Permanently delete all privacy-sensitive data. This action cannot be undone.

riskDialog.title: Use with Excessive Caution
riskDialog.intro: By enabling Quant Mode, you gain access to predictive models and trade-like signals. Please confirm you understand the following:
riskDialog.risk1: Predictive K-Lines are AI hallucinations based on historical patterns and do not guarantee future performance.
riskDialog.risk2: This software is for educational and analytical purposes only.
riskDialog.risk3: The author (and the AI) assumes no responsibility for any financial losses incurred based on these outputs.

clearDialog.title: Confirm Privacy Data Deletion
clearDialog.confirm: Are you absolutely sure you want to delete ALL privacy data?
clearDialog.frontend: Frontend: API keys, base URLs, model preferences, Quant Mode settings
clearDialog.backend: Backend: Data source configurations and API endpoint settings
clearDialog.warning: This action cannot be undone. You will need to reconfigure everything from scratch.
